snippet: Russell Wilson, overshadowed by the fellow rookie quarterbacks Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III, led Seattle to an overtime win Sunday in Chicago.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks defeat Chicago Bears, 23-17, in overtime; Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson turns in stellar performance.
lead_paragraph: Russell Wilson, overshadowed by the fellow rookie quarterbacks Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III, led Seattle to an overtime win Sunday in Chicago.

headline.seo: Seahawks’ Russell Wilson Shows He Belongs Near Head of Rookie Class
headline.main: Seahawks’ Wilson Shows He Belongs Near Head of Rookie Class
headline.print_headline: Wilson Shows He Belongs Near Head of Rookie Class
